message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you a great deal on this fantastic product. I think you'll really love it!
Thanks for the offer, Alice. I'm interested in the product, but your price is a little high for me. Would you consider $85?
I appreciate your offer, Bob, but I'm still a bit above $85. I can do $92, which is my best price for now. Let me know if that works for you!
